# [Interview #955: AMOL Signing Report - rossnewberry, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=955#1)

#### rossnewberry

Is there a difference in the steps required to make an
*angreal*
or a
*sa'angreal*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

There's nothing in the notes that points to a difference.
